actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide that the allowance for stationery for Members of the House of Representatives may not be withdrawn in cash.

summary.text: Provides that the allowance for stationery for Members of the House of Representatives may not be withdrawn in cash. States that any such allowance remaining to the credit of any Member at the close of a session of the Congress may not be carried forward as an allowance to the credit of such member during any ensuing session of the Congress.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that the allowance for stationery for Members of the House of Representatives may not be withdrawn in cash.
